feels.name: Anger
feels.quote: Valancy smarted anew with the sting of that old recollection.

feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: Valancy was afraid of Dr. Stalling—had been afraid of him ever since the Sunday, twenty-three years before, when he had first come to St. Albans’.

feels.name: Rebellion
feels.quote: Valancy was once more seething with rebellion as she walked along.

feels.name: Desire
feels.quote: Valancy stopped suddenly aghast at her own recklessness. She felt sure that Rev. Dr. Stalling, who passed her at this moment, read her thoughts and disapproved of them thoroughly.

feels.name: Realization
feels.quote: Valancy shut _Magic of Wings_ and stood up. She would go and see Dr. Trent.

Places.name: Uncle_Benjamin_s_grocerystore
Places.description: Where Valancy buys tea and beans

Places.name: Church
Places.description: Where Valancy was called up by Dr. Stalling

Places.name: Street_corner
Places.description: Where Valancy felt desire for a husband, a house, and children

Places.name: Readingroom
Places.description: Where Valancy reads John Foster's paragraph about fear
